description: A BridgeRoom is a space within a Bridge or BridgePart intended for human occupancy (e.g. a place of work or recreation) and/or containment (storage) of animals or things. A BridgeRoom is bounded physically and/or virtually (e.g. by ClosureSurfaces or GenericSurfaces).

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the BridgeRoom.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the BridgeRoom.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the BridgeRoom.

properties.name: bridgeFurniture
properties.description: Relates the furniture objects to the BridgeRoom.

properties.name: bridgeInstallation
properties.description: Relates to the installation objects to the BridgeRoom.

properties.name: lod4Solid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Solid geometry that represents the BridgeRoom in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the BridgeRoom in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
